tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PolicyMakers (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR,
	title VARCHAR,
	email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id UUID,
    regulation_id UUID,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    compliance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_maker_id INT NOT NULL,
    regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    compliance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Violations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_maker_id INT NOT NULL,
    regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
    violation_description TEXT,
    violation_date DATE
);
